definition: oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning

sentences.english: What about motorcycle V. S. car oils ???
sentences.chinese: 摩托車和汽車機油對比怎麼樣？

sentences.english: The quality of the diesel engine oil is equivalent to that of the foreign products.
sentences.chinese: 柴油機油的質量達到了國際同類產品的水平。

sentences.english: Before travelling we must ensure the availability of petrol and oil.
sentences.chinese: 旅行前，我們必須確保能夠買到汽油和機油。

sentences.english: Clean any oil stains off the underbody panelling.
sentences.chinese: 清除車底飾板上的任何機油污跡。

sentences.english: The oil drains off and runs down into the pan.
sentences.chinese: 機油再流下來回到油盤。

sentences.english: Install dipstick and verify it is seated in the tube.
sentences.chinese: 安裝引擎機油尺並確認它安放在管中。

sentences.english: The worker bathed machine parts in the oil.
sentences.chinese: 工人把機器零件浸入機油中。

sentences.english: The whole machine undergoes the ray lubrication and is equi ed with engine oil automatic balance facilities.
sentences.chinese: 整機噴淋式潤滑，附設機油自動平衡裝置。

sentences.english: The oil pump is driven by a chain drive on the crankshaft.
sentences.chinese: 機油泵由曲軸上的鏈條驅動裝置來驅動。

sentences.english: Fit timing chain cover on oil pump.
sentences.chinese: 安裝機油泵的正時鏈條罩。

sentences.english: Have you heard of oil cap or drain plug not tightened?
sentences.chinese: 你曾聽說過機油蓋或泄油螺絲沒栓緊的事嗎？

sentences.english: Applying mass flow oil pump guarantees the reliability of the lubricating system.
sentences.chinese: 採用大流量機油泵，確保潤滑系統穩定可靠。

sentences.english: Use an energy-conserving (E. C. ) grade of motor oil.
sentences.chinese: 使用節能級發動機機油。

sentences.english: The oil that is splashed around will circulate metal debris to the lubricated bearing surfaces.
sentences.chinese: 許多四處飛濺的機油會將金屬屑帶進軸承表面。

sentences.english: Install dipstick and verify it is seated in e tube.
sentences.chinese: 安裝引擎機油尺並確認它安放在管中。

sentences.english: I also need you to check the oil and the radiator.
sentences.chinese: 還要檢查一下機油和散熱器。

definition: Brothers!/brethren/dude (colloquial)/brother (diminutive form of address between males)
original poster (in an online forum)/landlord of a building (traditional)
easy to deal with/not a problem/(polite answer) you flatter me
to play/to have fun/to hang out
(slang) to hook up for a one night stand/booty call
don't tell me .../could it be that...?
